import "./messenger.css"; import Topbar from "../../components/topbar/Topbar"; import Conversation from "../../components/conversation/Conversation"; import Message from "../../components/message/Message"; import ChatOnline from "../../components/chatOnline/ChatOnline"; import { useContext, useState } from "react"; import { AuthContext } from "../../context/AuthContext"; export default function Messenger() { const [conversations, setConversations] = useState([]); const {user} = useContext(AuthContext); return ( <>
); }
